required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Improving Outcome of Very Preterm Infants Using Collaborative Quality Improvement
clinical_study.official_title: Improving the Outcome of Very Preterm Infants Using Evidence-based Collaborative Quality Improvement: A Multi-center Prospective Study

collaborator.agency: Shanghai First Maternity and Infant Hospital Tongji University School of Medicine
Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
Obstetrics & Gynecology Hospital of Fudan University

brief_summary.textblock: A multicenter interventional study using evidence-based collaborative quality improvement to reduce mortality and major morbidities of very preterm infants in six neonatal centers in Shanghai

primary_outcome.description: It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if death or with any of the following major morbidities: bronchopulmonary dysplasia, necrotizing stage II or above, retinopathy of prematurity stage III or above, intraventricular hemorrhage grade III or above or cystic periventricular leukomalacia and late-onset epsis

secondary_outcome.description: It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients dead during hospitalization or 28 days after discharge against medical advice
It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients reveived respiratory support or oxygen at 36 weeks' corrected gestational age or on discharge
It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients appeared with NEC stage II or above

It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients appeared with intraventricular hemorrhage grade III or above within 28 days after birth or cystic periventricular leukomalacia
It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients appeared with ROP stage III or above.
It is a binary varibale (1/0). The variabel would be setted into "1",if patients appeared with culture-proven sepsis after 72 hours after birth
days for the first NICU hospitalization

arm_group.description: The 1.5-year period during which all six participating centers receive evidence-based collaborative quality improvement interventions including benchmarking, potential better practice list, PDSA implementation, and collaborative learning
The 2-year period before the collaborative quality improvement intervention

intervention.description: Evidence-based collaborative quality improvement interventions including benchmarking, potential better practice list, PDSA implementation and collaborative learning

facility.name: Obstetrics and Gynecoloy Hospital of Fudan University
Children's Hospital of Shanghai Jiao Tong University
Xinhua Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
Shanghai First Maternity and Infant Hosipital
